name: Factory Panic
description:
Factory Panic is a game about managing the bins at an ore processing facility.

As the bins overflow, the ore spills out all over the floor and slows your movement -- so while you need the ore to match wanted alloy patterns and get big points, you need to keep your work area clean lest the factory halt due to unsafe conditions.

Controls:

Move: Left & Right OR A & D
Grab/Drop: X or LMB
Sweep: C or RMB
